Name: Boston Nursing Home
About the game: STORY You’ve been a Boston resident for decades. Today you happen across an abandoned nursing home in Boston that you’ve heard many mysteries about. Peering in, you notice stained and piled furniture that indicates a sudden and serious incident… So you grab a flashlight, walk into the building and begin to discover the secret inside. FEATURE Explore Explore this creepy nursing home, experience the terrifying journey, and discover the secrets within. Survival A terrifying spirit is roaming in this place, one mistake could lead you to hell. So, be careful, you’ll need more than a little luck. Puzzle However, the horror spirit is not the only threat you’ll face. Find clues, try to unlock secret doors and rooms, and piece together the truth. Collect Find messages left by previous occupants of the building, discover the history inside this nursing home. GAMEPLAY A first-person horror adventure game. Players explore the abandoned nursing home, uncover its unknown secrets, and face threats along the way. CONTACT siyuan.wang625920@tufts.edu
